Classic Death Match
Score points by killing any player besides yourself, which lowers your points.
Spawnscreen: Use the arrow keys to navigate between teams and press Enter to join one. You will spawn on one of your chosen teams spawn- points, with the weapon(s) assigned to the team.
Ingame: Press I anywhere to show map blips of all close-by vehicles. (radius= 250m)
Note: Although there are teams listed in this game-mode, it is not necessarily team based. You will score a kill even if you kill someone on your team.
